title: someone from riot plz help me!! :(
body:
ok so this really dumb thing just happened. I wanted to change my password so i did. But now that ive changed it, it says that its wrong  and the old one dosnt work. Now i tried to get the email however the email that its linked to is an old hotmail account which is no longer active, but since my password isnt working i cant cahnge where the email goes to, therefroe locking me out of my account.

Can someone from riot plz help me recover my account, like change my email for me so i can access the password?

replies.body: No worries, we'd like to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help with recovering and updating your account information.  Check out our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preparation of questions you may be asked for verification.  We'll respond back asap!
